name: Colrum's Legacy
description:
Dangerous Colrum Mercenaries captured even more dangerous criminal. Han pays well for his head. Escort him to your base safe and well fed and Han will reward you generously.

O.K. I'm still working on Red Sand Planet, but due to a lot of errors appearing while I try to remake that map I've delayed release for some time. But during that time I've made a Much! (lolsguy, I started small!:)) more smaller map to play. Send me a message if you notice some bugs or errors. Hope you enjoy it. In some time I will continue Red Sand and this one, will you enjoy them or not:))

Update(20.09.11): I remade primary objectives. The game didn't change much thou, but now it's more clear what you Need to do.
author: _ForgeUser7508666
